brand.name: ScaleUp Ventures
brand.tagline: We Prove It Before You Buy

logos.description: Clean 3 stacked chevrons - navy base chevrons with gold middle accent, architectural V-shapes with extended vertical legs creating a cohesive upward-pointing form
logos.designNotes: Features 3 nested chevrons with the gold chevron in the middle position. The design has clean geometric precision with extended legs that create visual continuity. Strong vertical emphasis suggests stability and growth.

logos.description: 3 nested chevrons with organic, slightly curved edges - gold top chevron crowning two navy base chevrons, creating a more dynamic and approachable feel
logos.designNotes: Features softer, more organic chevron forms with the gold chevron at the pinnacle. The curved edges add warmth while maintaining the upward momentum. Base chevrons have subtle organic shaping suggesting natural growth.

logos.description: Extraordinary architectural interpretation - chevrons reimagined as a building/monument with gold crown pinnacle, flanking tower elements, and layered structural chevron base
logos.designNotes: Most creative interpretation featuring chevrons as architectural elements. Gold chevron serves as the 'crown' of a building-like structure. Flanking vertical elements suggest towers or columns. Multiple layered navy chevrons form a substantial structural base. Feels monumental and substantial - like a corporate headquarters logo.

evaluationCriteria.substanceTest: All three designs convey professionalism suitable for a 58-year-old business owner
evaluationCriteria.precisionTest: Geometric forms are clean and intentional across all variations
evaluationCriteria.clicheTest: Avoids generic arrows, checkmarks, or play buttons - chevrons feel architectural
evaluationCriteria.scaleTest: All designs should work at favicon size (32px) due to clean geometric forms
evaluationCriteria.trustTest: Navy and gold palette conveys established expertise and premium positioning
evaluationCriteria.timelessnessTest: Clean geometric approach should remain relevant for 10+ years
